What's included

Weekly 1 session (60-90 min)
Personal custom roadmap
Live trade reviews and feedback

Monthly evaluation and adjustment

What you DON'T get

Guaranteed profits or income claims
Trading signals or copy-trading
24/7 availability (office hours only)
Financial advice or investment recommendations
Support for trading strategies other than SMC

Complete Smart Money Concepts Curriculum

A structured 20-week program from basic to advanced trading strategies

Week 1-2
Module 1

Market Structure & Trend Analysis

  • Identifying Higher Highs & Higher Lows
  • Recognizing Lower Highs & Lower Lows
  • Trend changes and momentum shifts
  • Support and resistance levels
  • Market phases: accumulation, distribution, trending
Week 3-4
Module 2

Break of Structure (BOS) & Change of Character (CHOCH)

  • BOS identification and confirmation
  • CHOCH signals and timing
  • Internal structure vs external structure
  • Multi-timeframe structure analysis
  • Recognizing false breakouts
Week 5-6
Module 3

Premium & Discount Zones

  • 50% retracement and fibonacci levels
  • Premium zone trading strategies
  • Discount zone entry techniques
  • Range trading within zones
  • Optimal entry and exit timing
Week 7-8
Module 4

Liquidity Concepts

  • Equal Highs (EQH) identification
  • Equal Lows (EQL) and sweep patterns
  • Liquidity grabs and stop hunts
  • Institutional order flow
  • Liquidity pools and market manipulation
Week 9-10
Module 5

Inducement & Market Manipulation

  • Recognizing inducement patterns
  • Fake moves and retail traps
  • Institutional vs retail sentiment
  • News trading and event manipulation
  • Smart money footprints
Week 11-12
Module 6

Order Blocks & Institutional Levels

  • Bullish and bearish order blocks
  • Order block validation and confirmation
  • Timeframe correlation of blocks
  • Breaker blocks and mitigated zones
  • Order block trading strategies
Week 13-14
Module 7

Fair Value Gaps (FVG)

  • FVG identification and types
  • Imbalance trading strategies
  • FVG fill expectations
  • Volume confirmation for gaps
  • Multi-timeframe gap analysis
Week 15-16
Module 8

Risk & Money Management

  • Position sizing and risk per trade
  • R-multiple and risk/reward ratios
  • Portfolio diversification
  • Drawdown management
  • Capital preservation strategies
Week 17-18
Module 9

Trading Psychology & Routine

  • Emotion management during trading
  • Discipline and consistency
  • Trading routine development
  • Journal writing and self-analysis
  • Preventing FOMO and revenge trading
Week 19-20
Module 10

Personal Playbook Development

  • Personal trading strategy
  • Setup checklists and criteria
  • Market condition filtering
  • Performance tracking and KPIs
  • Continuous improvement process

What you learn in this program

Complete understanding of Smart Money Concepts and institutional trading
Independently analyze market structure and trends
Apply effective risk management and position sizing
Maintain discipline and emotional control during trading
Develop your own trading playbook and routine
Execute consistently profitable trading strategies
